Package image.view

Interface View

All Known Implementing Classes:
ViewImpl
public interface View
Represents the View for the Image Generator application.
Version:
09/20/2019
Author:
Peter Laudat

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void setFeatures​(Features f)
    Accept the set of callbacks from the controller, and hook up as needed to various things in this view.
    void updateDisplay​(Image image)
    Update this view's display with the given image.
    void updateDisplay​(String inFile)
    Update this view's display given the input file name.

  • Method Details

    • setFeatures

      void setFeatures​(Features f)
      Accept the set of callbacks from the controller, and hook up as needed to various things in this view.
      Parameters:
      f - the set of feature callbacks as a Features object

    • updateDisplay

      void updateDisplay​(String inFile)
      Update this view's display given the input file name.
      Parameters:
      inFile - input file

    • updateDisplay

      void updateDisplay​(Image image)
      Update this view's display with the given image.
      Parameters:
      image - image
